subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth made a 30-foot birdie putt on the third extra hole of a playoff at Innisbrook in Palm Harbor, Fla., to beat his Ryder Cup teammate Patrick Reed and Sean O’Hair in the Valspar Championship.
snippet: Jordan Spieth made a 30-foot birdie putt on the third extra hole of a playoff at Innisbrook in Palm Harbor, Fla., to beat his Ryder Cup teammate Patrick Reed and Sean O’Hair in the Valspar Championship.
